QuestData.Title: A Titanic Effort
QuestData.Description:
Illidan may have forced fate's hand, but bringing Argus so near to Azeroth has accelerated the reaction triggered by the Nightwell's collapse.
I believe the Legion's actions on Argus are further destabilizing the powers we've drawn upon unknowingly for many years.
It is clear that further studies are required.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring $1oa Wakening Essence to Arcanomancer Vridiel.
